Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Dish
Description: Very wide dish with a very large and rounded base and a slightly flared body that ends in a tapered lip. The clay is fine, compact, well fired and red-orange. The vase has been polished and the rim is decorated with a tiny red line. Several small dots of the same colour can be found on the interior.
